item.title: The best foreign language for science? 6 reasons why (anglophone) researchers should learn German
item.author: Author
item.description: English is the indesputable lingua-franca of science. Scientific work is published in English, conferences are conducted in English, and scientific courses of study at universities around the world are often at least partially taught in English. There’s no getting around English in science.
